Test Name: Chromosome Analysis from Chorionic Villus Sampling (CVS)
Purpose: To perform chromosome analysis (karyotyping) on chorionic villus tissue for prenatal genetic assessment.
Container: Sterile container with culture medium or saline solution kept at 2–8 °C
Equipment: Centrifuge, 37 °C CO2 incubator, dissecting microscope, light microscope, culture flasks, and associated cytogenetic staining materials
